MemoryInfobox.description: 'Shipwrecks were always a risk, but they were never as abundant as when Steropes roamed. Witnesses swore they'd seen him, the Lightning Bringer, on a rampage around the Greece|Greek world.'

General_Description: '''The Lightning Bringer''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra travelled to the island of [[Andros]] to eliminate [[Steropes]] the [[cyclops]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra travelled to Andros. With [[Ikaros]]' help, she found the cyclops inhabiting a cave on the [[Steropes Bay|bay]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There he is.''
Kassandra approached the bay, drawing out the beast. She was able to eliminate the cyclops after some effort, claiming a [[Steropes' Bow|bow]] from its body.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra defeated Steropes, claiming a bow from its body.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra travelled to Andros. With [[Ikaros]]' help, she found the cyclops inhabiting a cave on the [[Steropes Bay|bay]].
Kassandra approached the bay, drawing out the beast. She was able to eliminate the cyclops after some effort, claiming a [[Steropes' Bow|bow]] from its body.
